question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job.Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter:describe the problem with the equipmentexplain how this problem is affecting your worksay what you want the shop or company to do
text: This is to bring to your kind notice that I brought a Dell laptop from your store last year and I am facing technical issues with the same.  I would like to add, that it is still under warranty. (Bill No - XYZ12345)

Yesterday I started the laptop and it was not responding. Despite the number of attempts of restarting and shutting down, it is unable to start.  In addition to that, the LAN cable port is not working. Due to the current situation, I work from home for a consultancy firm and facing such challenges would risk my job as I don't have any alternate solution to it.
Could you immediately send someone from your technical team to look into it. If you want me to come to your store to get the laptop checked, then also it works for me.
I am hopeful that my concern would be addressed with high priority.

error_list.error_des: Consider using a question mark to signify that this sentence is a question.
